member.name: T:Microsoft.Singularity.Io.DiskDeviceContract.GetStartSector
member.summary: Retrieve sector offset of first sector on disk or partition.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Singularity.Io.DiskDeviceContract.GetSectorCount
member.summary: Retrieve number of sectors available on drive or partition.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Singularity.Io.DiskDeviceContract.GetSystemId
member.summary: Query for system identifier from partition table for partition. This method is only applicable to partitioned drives.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Singularity.Io.DiskDeviceContract.Read
member.summary: Read data from disk. Relative sector on disk or partition to read data from.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Singularity.Io.DiskDeviceContract.Write
member.summary: Write data to disk. Relative sector on disk or partition to write data to.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Singularity.Io.IoTestContract.Read
member.summary: Read data from device. Size of data to read from.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Singularity.Io.IoTestContract.Write
member.summary: Write data to device. Length of data to write.
